title: Analysts Predict $7 Trillion Global GDP Increase From AI; Some Developers Urge Caution

title: ‘Rung of Hell’: The Hidden Misery of EV Cobalt Supply Chains
description: Artisanal miners carry sacks of ore at the Shabara artisanal cobalt mine near Kolwezi, Congo, on Oct. 12, 2022. Demand for the metal is exploding due to its use in the rechargeable batteries that power mobile phones and electric cars. (Junior Kannah/AFP via Getty Images)

title: Apple Tells Users Not to Hang up on Operators in Accidental 911 Calls
